headline: Crown Castle Declares Quarterly Common Stock Dividend
summary: HOUSTON, Feb. 25, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Crown Castle Inc. (NYSE: CCI) ("Crown Castle") announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.0625 per common share. The quarterly dividend is payable on March 31, 2026, to common stockholders of record at the close of business on March 13, 2026. Future dividends are subject to the approval of Crown Castle's Board of Directors. ABOUT CROWN CASTLE Crown Castle owns, operates and leases approximately 40,000 cell t

headline: The London Company Mid Cap Strategy Exited Crown Castle (CCI) for Higher-Conviction Ideas
summary: The London Company, an investment management company, released its fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter for its “The London Company Mid Cap Strategy”. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In Q4 2025, US equities posted the third consecutive quarter of higher returns, with the Russell 3000 Index rising 2.4%. headline: Crown Castle (CCI) Valuation Check As Fiber Sale And DISH Termination Reshape Cash Flow Outlook
summary: Crown Castle (CCI) is in the spotlight after moving to sell its small cell and fiber businesses, while terminating its agreement with DISH Wireless over payment defaults. This combination puts revenue mix and dividend resilience under scrutiny. See our latest analysis for Crown Castle. The recent decision to sell the small cell and fiber businesses and end the DISH agreement comes after a mixed stretch for investors, with a 30 day share price return of 2.36% but a 3 year total shareholder...
